entities.name: frank bryce
entities.description: Frank Bryce is a person who returned to his cottage on the grounds of the Riddle House. He is mentioned as someone who tends the garden for the next family who lives in the house.

entities.name: dot
entities.description: Dot is a person who expresses suspicion about Frank Bryce's involvement in a crime and suggests he should leave the Riddle House.

entities.name: riddle house
entities.description: The Riddle House is a location where Frank Bryce lives and tends to the garden. It is also mentioned as being owned by a wealthy man who does not live there.

relationships.description: Frank Bryce lives in the Riddle House and tends to its garden.
Dot accuses Frank Bryce of being involved in a crime.
